main event: A bright light object was observed over Camp Butler, Ohio for approximately 2 minutes. It made a sudden stop from rapid horizontal flight, hovered for about 10 seconds, then accelerated vertically and disappeared.
interesting points: The object was brighter than a star and larger than planets seen in the night sky.
The light appeared white-bluish in color.
The object made a sudden stop from rapid horizontal flight, hovered, then accelerated vertically and disappeared.
The detail of the object was not discernible.
The sighting occurred at 2230 hours on February 14, 1964.
